sentences.en: He died two days shy of his 95th birthday.
sentences.cn: 他在离95岁寿辰仅差两天时去世了。

sentences.en: He retired in 1970, on his fiftieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 他在1970年自己50岁生日时退了休。

sentences.en: He was greeted with a rousing chorus of Happy Birthday.
sentences.cn: 迎接他的是大家齐唱《祝你生日快乐》，令他非常感动。

sentences.en: He was knighted in the Queen's birthday honours list in June 1988.
sentences.cn: 他于1988年6月被封为爵士，是女王生日宴会上的受勋者之一。

sentences.en: Her children had the best, most elaborate birthday parties in the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 她的孩子们的生日聚会在街坊四邻里是最好、最讲究的。

sentences.en: I bought a birthday present for my mother.
sentences.cn: 我给母亲买了一份生日礼物。

sentences.en: I might buy one for a friend's birthday as a giggle.
sentences.cn: 我可能会买一件送给朋友当生日礼物，逗他开心。

sentences.en: I took some photos with her camera on my birthday.
sentences.cn: 我用她的相机在我过生日那天拍了些照片。

sentences.en: I'm getting a bike for my birthday.
sentences.cn: 我过生日时会得到一辆自行车。

sentences.en: Mr Stevens recently cele-brated his eightieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯先生最近庆祝了他的80大寿。

sentences.en: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.cn: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.en: She gave birth to Annabel just after her seventeenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 她17岁生日刚过便生下了安娜贝尔。

sentences.en: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.cn: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

sentences.en: We got engaged on my eighteenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 在我18岁生日那天我们订婚了。

sentences.en: What else have you had for your birthday?
sentences.cn: 你还收到了别的什么生日礼物？

phrases.tran_cn: n. 生日女郎（电影名，等于惊婚计）
生日快乐；祝你生日快乐
乔治华盛顿诞辰纪念日

trans.tran_en: your birthday is a day that is an exact number of years after the day you were born
